name: Dragon Ball Z: Frieza's Return
description:
Frieza has come to Earth in search for the Dragon Balls! Can you stop him?

Team up with Gohan, Vegeta and Trunks in this quick game to take an adventure and stop Frieza!

Includes:

  • 9 maps
  • 5 Playable Characters
  • 14 Enemies
  • 5 Mini Bosses
  • 21 Transformations
  • 37 Skills
  • Some voice acting
  • Working Shenron and Dragon Balls

Game  is still being developed, so I am still adding more content. Right now, it's just a quick game I threw together in a week. Please let me know of what improvements I can make. Thank you taking your time if you  played this!!
